summary: LAotB adds every missing armor and weapon upgrade to Skyrim. It also adds several missing forge recipes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=14]Description:[/size][/center]
Lost Art of the Blackmith adds every missing weapon and armor improvement recipe to Skyrim. Useful crafting recipes for Silver weapons, royal armguards, lockpicks, work axes, and Imperial light armor are added as well. 

This mod is lore-friendly, balanced, and should work with any language. The upgrades are determined by your smithing skills, enhancements, perks, and the base damage of the weapon. 

LAotB can be enhanced with [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6047]Smithing Perks Overhaul[/url] and [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4719]Weapon and Armor Fixes[/url] by Headbomb. With all three mods, all vanilla weapons should behave consistently and with the same advantages of every other weapon in the game.

[u]New upgrades for:[/u]
Dragon Priest Daggers
Drainblood BattleAxes
Drainheart Swords
Drainspell Bows
Falmer Supple Bows
Fine Armguards
Forks
Gilded Wristguards
Headsmans Axes
Honed Falmer Swords
Honed Falmer War Axes
Knifes
Nord Hero Bows
Keening
Pickaxes
Scaled Horn Armor
Shivs
Shrouded Cowls (Maskless)
Silver Greatswords
Silver Swords
Skyforge Steel Daggers
Supple Ancient Nord Bows
Studded Imperial Armor
The Amulet of Articulation
The Diadem of the Savant
The Ebony Blade
The Jagged Crown
The Masque of Clavicus Vile
The Nightingale Blade (05)
The Shield of Solitude
The Shield of Ysgramor
The Tumblerbane Gloves
The Woodsman\'s Friend
Thieve\'s Guild Master\'s Armor
Woodcutter\'s Axes
Worn Dark Brotherhood Armor
Ulfric\'s Bracers
Wuuthrad itself

[u]New crafting recipes at forges:[/u]
Fine Armguards
Gilded Wristguards
Headsman\'s Axes
Imperial Bows
Imperial Light Armors (inc. Studded)
Imperial Light Shields
Imperal Officer\'s Helmets
Imperial Swords
Lockpicks
Pickaxes
Scaled Horn Armor
Silver Greatswords
Silver Swords
Woodcutter\'s Axes

[center][size=14]Installation:[/size][/center]
Extract the .esp file to your \\Skyrim\\data directory, and enable the file in your game launcher.

If you correctly installed the mod and your Data Files option is greyed out in the launcher, you will need to do the following.
1. Go to Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim
2. Open up the SkyrimPrefs.ini file
3. Look about half way down for [Launcher]
4. Add \"bEnableFileSelection=1\" to the bottom of that section without quotes and save the file.
The Data Files option should now appear on the launcher.

This mod will not conflict with other mods. If the same recipe is included in another mod, however, it may appear twice ingame. 

[u]Uninstallation:[/u]
In the rare event that you want to uninstall this mod, simply delete the ESP. Items that have been upgraded will not lose their improvements. 

[u]Known Bugs:[/u]
None! Go find some. 

[u]Changelog:[/u]
[B]1.0 - First release version, adds upgrades for:[/B]
Gilded Wristguards
Scaled Horn Armor
Shrouded Cowls (Maskless)
Silver Greatswords
Silver Swords
Skyforge Steel Daggers
Shield of Ysgramor
Tumblerbane Gloves
Wuuthrad

Adds crafting for:
Gilded Wristguards
Silver Greatswords
Silver Swords

[B]1.1 - Adds upgrades for:[/B]
Dragon Priest Daggers
Fine Armguards
Falmer Supple Bows
Nord Hero Bows
Pickaxes
Shivs
Supple Ancient Nord Bows
Studded Imperial Armor
The Ebony Blade
The Masque of Clavicus Vile
Woodcutter\'s Axes

Adds crafting for:
Fine Armguards

[B]1.2 - Adds upgrades for:[/B]
Honed Falmer Sword
Honed Falmer War Axe

[B]1.21 - Specifies formIDs for each recipe to help guarantee stability.[/B]

[B]1.22 - Adds support for:[/B]
The Real Real Ebony Blade

[B]1.25 - Adds upgrades for:[/B]
Drainblood BattleAxe
Drainheart Sword
Drainspell Bow
Headsmans Axe

[B]1.26 - Gives unique formIDs for the recipes introduced in 1.25[/B]

[B]1.29 - Adds (corrects) upgrades for:[/B]
The fifth Nightingale Blade

Changes:
Headman\'s and Woodcutter\'s Axes to upgrade with Iron ingots

Adds forge recipes for:
Headsman\'s Axes
Lockpicks (x5)
Pickaxes
Woodcutter\'s Axes

[B]1.35 - Adds upgrades for:[/B]
Keening
Worn Dark Brotherhood Shrouded Armor, Boots, Cowl and Gloves

Adds forge recipes for:
Imperial Light Armor, Boots, Helmet, Gauntlets, and Shield
Imperial Officer\'s Helmet
Scaled Horn Curiass 
Studded Imperial Armor

Changes:
Headman\'s Axe forge recipe requirements increased slightly. 

[B]1.4 - Adds upgrades for:[/B]
The Jagged Crown
The Shield of Solitude
The Woodsman\'s Friend
Thieve\'s Guild Master\'s Armor
Ulfric\'s Bracers

[B]1.45 - Adds upgrades for:[/B]
Forks and knifes
The Amulet of Articulation
The Diadem of the Savant

Adds forge recipes for:
Imperial Bow
Imperial Sword (On the Steel menu)

Changes:
Woodaxes and Pickaxes now require a small amount of firewood to build.
The Blade of Woe and Wuuthrad both now use Ebony Ingots to improve.

[center][size=14]Notes:[/size][/center]

Most of the new recipes appear in the misc section because this mod does not overwrite any vanilla (or modded) stats for the items. 

Version 1.45 includes all missing crafting recipes that I am aware of. If you discover more, please let me know in the comments section or by messaging me. Enjoy!

Check out Samutz\' [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1178]Fletching Mod[/url] 
Sylkwyrm\'s [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=454]Enchantable Unique Items[/url]
Valdosa\'s [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=874] Smelting mod[/url]
and 
AeonVita\'s [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=799]More Craftables mod[/url] 
for more smithing goodness. 

Misc: 
[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2916]ZeroTorrent\'s Keening Enchantment fix[/url]

:-)
author: Impulseve
